item.description:
A social gathering in a public place. Not to be confused with a rally, a cotillion, or a members-only salon.

This will be August's social event; a more focused evening revolving around a discussion of what atheism and human rights will be announced for earlier in the month as details are firmed up. If you have suggestions on topic, format, or a speaker guest, please let me know.

Parking is available on the street and in nearby lots. Boston Beer Works is easily accessible by trolly or bus. The Sox are away this night, so I don't anticipate the sort of congestion we've had to deal with in the past.
item.name: Boston Atheists in August
